verses.roman:
śuni' śivānandera patnī kāndite lāgilā
hena-kāle śivānanda ghāṭī haite āilā

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; śivānandera—of Śivānanda Sena; patnī—the wife; kāndite lāgilā—began to cry; hena-kāle—at this time; śivānanda—Śivānanda Sena; ghāṭī haite—from the toll station; āilā—came.
translation: Hearing this curse, Śivānanda Sena's wife began to cry. Just then, Śivānanda returned from the toll station.
